poemsDataJson.list_full: ながらへば またこのごろや しのばれむ 憂(う)しと見(み)し世(よ)ぞ 今(いま)は恋(こひ)しき
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: If I should live long,//Then perhaps the present days//May be dear to me,//Just as past time filled with grief//Comes quietly back in thought.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Nagaraeba|Mata konogoro ya|Shinoba ren|Ushi to mishi yo zo|Ima wa koishiki
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: うしとみしよそ いまはこひしき
poemsDataJson.author: 藤原清輔朝臣(ふじわらのきよすけあそん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: つらく苦しい現実に暗く沈みがちな心境
